name: PersonalTeleporter
title: 个人传送器
author: WhatheWorld
description: 这个mod给游戏添加了个人传送器. 多谢iUltimateLP和他的简易传送装置启发了我并且感谢使用了他的代码和贴图。汉化By贴吧zh657415571
description_original: This mod adds personal Teleaporter to the game. A lot of Thanks to iUltimateLP and his mod SimpleTeleporters for inspiration and for the use of His Code and graphics
